"Magatsu's Descent":
"Planet Harkotanに封印されていた
『禍津』の一部が超巨大な敵性存在として
顕現し, Shironiaに向けて侵攻を始めた。
Sukuna-himeの力を借りつつ
全力で『禍津』の迎撃にあたる。
――――――――――――――――――――
失敗条件/最終門の破壊, 制限時間の経過"

"On Planet Harkotan, a fragment of \"Magatsu\" has
escaped and started invading Shironia as a
towering giant. With Sukuna-hime's assistance,
you head on to intercept \"Magatsu\" with full power."

"From here, we've detected the appearance
of the Harkotan deity \"Magatsu\".
Please finalize checking of your equipment."
"It's said that it was sealed on the planet. We're assuming you'll be fighting a large battle, so don't be careless."
